definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (etym. dub.; possibly = [[דַּרְדַּר]] belonging then sub [[דרר]], cf. Thes Add:83)—only 1Ki 5:11 Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Calcol, and Darda, the sons of Mahol (types of wise men, but Solomon wiser than they); = [[âָדּרַע]] 1Ch 2:6, where rd. [[דַּרְדַּע]] with SyrVer Targum & Codd.
